metadata.synopsis: Vlaaktih appears as a hologram and Laezel meets her for the first time. Avatar can decide if she accepts her orders to kill the prisoner or refuse. In both cases, the planecaster is activated.If you refuse, Vlaakith orders the inquisitor if alive to kill you if you try to exit the room or theatens to hunt you down if he's already dead. If Laezel is not yet convinced to side with the player, they have a chance to do it here if they refuse.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to 1357; 0; -785 in CRE_Main_A. Enter the captain's office, and go thorugh the dialogs as you want. Go to the Security office with Lae'zel in the party.Go through the Inquisitor dialog and show the artefact, or kill the inquisitor. This dialog automatically triggers afterwards.

23.speaker: Vlaakith
23.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The planecaster vibrates, shaking the ground around it. 
Flares of light curl up in its centre and grow to full form. 
Vlaakith appears, awesome and terrible, at least twice the size of any human, a hologram in a haze of astral flares.

125.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The planecaster vibrates, shaking the ground around it. 
Flares of light curl up in its centre and grow to full form. 
Vlaakith appears, awesome and terrible, at least twice the size of any human, a hologram in a haze of astral flares.

60.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Inquisitor kneels before Vlaakith's image, surprised to see her. All of his staff kneel also. NodeContext: pronounced VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI (meaning 'For the honour of Vlaakith!')

69.speaker: Ch'r'ai W'wargaz
69.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Inquisitor kneels before Vlaakith's image, surprised to see her. All of his staff kneel also. NodeContext: pronounced VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI (meaning 'For the honour of Vlaakith!')

100.speaker: Lae'zel
100.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel kneelsNodeContext: shkaath ZAI - for the honour!

59.speaker: Vlaakith
59.text: You are permitted to look upon me. You are invited to kneel.

106.speaker: Lae'zel
106.text: The Deathless Queen has spoken. You will obey.

17.speaker: Player
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel grimaces in anger, but remains silent

44.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel grimaces in anger, but remains silent

86.speaker: Vlaakith
86.context: NodeContext: her facade splinters a little, letting her mad, immortal rage take over

89.speaker: Vlaakith
89.text: I am Vlaakith. Undying Queen of the noble githyanki. God Regent of the Six Arms of Tu'narath.
89.context: NodeContext: anger should build rhythmically here, each consonant semi-spat in rage

74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith gains her composure and motions everyone to rise. Everyone present rises.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: Stay standing, exactly as you are.
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player waves politely at Vlaakith.

0.speaker: Player
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player waves politely at Vlaakith.

4.text: Did your crèche teach you nothing?
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player waves politely at Vlaakith.

80.speaker: Vlaakith
80.text: Did your crèche teach you nothing?
80.context: InternalNodeContext: The Inquisitor hisses at the player while kneeling.

32.speaker: Vlaakith
32.text: I expected little of istik education, but here we kneel before our Queen.

76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith, unfazed in the least, motions everyone present to rise.l Everyone rises.

16.speaker: Player
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kneels, head bowed, solemn, appropriate. Vlaakith offers something resembling a smile, and gestures for the player to rise. Everyone present rises.

24.text: Your choice of allies is most vexing. They do not become you. Lae'zel.
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kneels, head bowed, solemn, appropriate. Vlaakith offers something resembling a smile, and gestures for the player to rise. Everyone present rises.

78.text: Your choice of allies is most vexing. They do not become you. Lae'zel.
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith looms in to face Lae'zel at their eye level.

99.text: Your choice of allies is most vexing. They do not become you. Lae'zel.
99.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith looms in to face Lae'zel at their eye level.

94.text: Your choice of allies is most vexing. They do not become you. Lae'zel.
94.context: NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith - Vlaakith's will above all

61.speaker: Vlaakith
61.text: Your choice of allies is most vexing. They do not become you. Lae'zel.
61.context: NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith - Vlaakith's will above all

8.speaker: Vlaakith
8.text: These attendants you keep - you taught them well. My child. My Lae'zel.
8.context: NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith - Vlaakith's will above all

67.speaker: Lae'zel
67.text: Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith. You know me.
67.context: NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith - Vlaakith's will above all

126.speaker: Vlaakith
126.text: Urlon of K'liir speaks most highly. As did Al'chaia before him.
126.context: NodeContext: UR-lawn | al-KYE-uh with a gutteral 'k'

38.speaker: Vlaakith
38.text: You seek purity. I may yet grant it.
38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith turns to player and looms over them instead.

20.text: Child of Gith. You carry what is mine. Do I call you loyal servant - or thief?
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith turns to player and looms over them instead.

112.text: Child of Gith. You carry what is mine. Do I call you loyal servant - or thief?
112.context: NodeContext: Yank = child. YAHNK to avoid sounding like she's calling the player an American

127.speaker: Vlaakith
127.text: Child of Gith. You carry what is mine. Do I call you loyal servant - or thief?
127.context: NodeContext: Yank = child. YAHNK to avoid sounding like she's calling the player an American

75.speaker: Vlaakith
75.text: Istik. You bear that which is ours. But are you friend, or are you thief?

14.speaker: Player
14.text: I didn't take the weapon from you, but I am returning it.
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

98.speaker: Vlaakith
98.text: An unexpected servant. Your will is strong.
98.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

39.speaker: Vlaakith
39.text: Your kind's stoic endurance will be a boon to our cause.
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

53.speaker: Vlaakith
53.text: Your kind's heritage is long and storied. It is an honour to be served by one so noble.
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

114.speaker: Vlaakith
114.text: Your kind is not known for trusting strangers. Quite rightly. Yet here you are.
114.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

31.speaker: Vlaakith
31.text: You have ventured far from your kind's comforts to serve us.
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

72.speaker: Vlaakith
72.text: Extend your fealty one step further, and you will be rewarded beyond your mortal reckoning.
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

43.speaker: Vlaakith
43.text: Descendant of noble dragons - you honour us with your allyship.

91.speaker: Vlaakith
91.text: Your kind will go far for glory. As you have shown by being here.

58.speaker: Vlaakith
58.text: My child. You walk on the path of ascension.

105.speaker: Player
105.text: I'm the hero who found your weapon.
105.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

10.speaker: Vlaakith
10.text: Your utility is proven. But your heroism is yet to be witnessed.
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

22.speaker: Vlaakith
22.text: A test, then, to see if you are as capable as you profess to be.
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

102.text: That 'weapon' you carry - the Astral Prism - it is corrupted.
102.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith summons a floating hologram of the artefact and psionically spins it, toying with it.

82.speaker: Vlaakith
82.text: That 'weapon' you carry - the Astral Prism - it is corrupted.
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith summons a floating hologram of the artefact and psionically spins it, toying with it.

21.speaker: Lae'zel
21.text: I will cleanse it for you, my Queen. Tell me how.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

57.speaker: Vlaakith
57.text: There is someone inside. Their mind is warped, broken - a blight.
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

15.speaker: Vlaakith
15.text: They are an agent of the Grand Design. Sent to sabotage the Astral Prism - our last defence against the return of the Illithid Empire.
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

122.speaker: Vlaakith
122.text: As long as they live, the Prism is compromised.
122.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

33.speaker: Vlaakith
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

3.speaker: Vlaakith
3.text: Do this, and I will cleanse you and your allies. Do this -
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith turns to Lae'zel at the end of the statement.

90.speaker: Lae'zel
90.text: Ascension? My queen. An honour gained, a burden borne.

11.speaker: Lae'zel
11.text: Choose. But know this: the cost of refusal is great.
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: The room rumbles, the gith (and inquisitor) in here look terrifiedNodeContext: she loses herself a bit in rage here,

37.speaker: Vlaakith
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: The room rumbles, the gith (and inquisitor) in here look terrifiedNodeContext: she loses herself a bit in rage here,

73.speaker: Player
73.text: I can't do that. The person inside protects me from the Absolute.
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: The room rumbles, the gith (and inquisitor) in here look terrifiedNodeContext: she loses herself a bit in rage here,

84.speaker: Vlaakith
84.context: CinematicNodeContext: The room rumbles, the gith (and inquisitor) in here look terrifiedNodeContext: she loses herself a bit in rage here,

88.speaker: Vlaakith
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: The room rumbles, the gith (and inquisitor) in here look terrifiedNodeContext: she loses herself a bit in rage here,

96.speaker: Lae'zel
96.text: Tsk'va. Do not defy my queen!
96.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel panicked and angry that you have spoken against the queen to her face

27.speaker: Player
27.text: Yes. I will enter the Prism and kill the occupant.
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith looks the player over, and gives a ghastly, frightening smile.

93.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith looks the player over, and gives a ghastly, frightening smile.

103.speaker: Player
103.text: No. In fact, maybe I'll free the one inside.

111.speaker: Lae'zel
111.text: Hshar'lak! You would stand against me?

54.speaker: Vlaakith
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: The image of Vlaakith flickers away within the planecaster, replaced by an image of the artefact suspended above the device.

62.speaker: Vlaakith
62.text: W'wargaz - see that my orders are followed. If not -
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: The image of Vlaakith flickers away within the planecaster, replaced by an image of the artefact suspended above the device.

5.speaker: Vlaakith
5.text: - eliminate them and enter the Prism yourself. See that protocol is done.

18.speaker: Vlaakith
18.text: Use this to enter the Prism, or deny me. The choice, as ever, is yours.

28.speaker: Vlaakith
28.text: But know this: my wrath is carried with each of my faithful. It will find you.

107.text: Vlaakith's eyes see beyond the planes. We cannot hide.

79.text: Vlaakith's eyes see beyond the planes. We cannot hide.

26.speaker: Lae'zel
26.text: Vlaakith's eyes see beyond the planes. We cannot hide.

130.speaker: Lae'zel
130.text: To refuse Vlaakith is to refuse me. You will do as she asks. Or I will be her wrath.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: Do what you deem right. I plan to do the same.

123.speaker: Lae'zel
123.text: I will wait here, and you will not leave this room except to enter the Prism. Turn your back on me, and you will feel my blade against it.

56.speaker: Lae'zel
56.text: I will wait here. Turn your back, and you will feel my blade against it.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: All we've seen, all we've done, and you would abandon me?

49.speaker: Lae'zel
49.text: You know where my fealty lies. You have always known.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: Follow my lead. You need to trust me, whatever comes next.

104.text: Very well - my trust is yours. But it is fragile. Break it, and be broken.

50.speaker: Lae'zel
50.text: Very well - my trust is yours. But it is fragile. Break it, and be broken.

117.speaker: Lae'zel
117.text: Come - we must enter the Prism. Its secrets are finally ours to know.

118.speaker: Player
118.text: If you're a god, do it yourself.

12.speaker: Player
12.text: I will do as you wish.
12.context: NodeContext: again, she's close to losing it a bit here, "would you" said with max venom

48.speaker: Player
48.text: It is my greatest honour to obey.
48.context: NodeContext: again, she's close to losing it a bit here, "would you" said with max venom

45.speaker: Player
45.text: No. I am not doing the githyanki queen's bidding.
45.context: NodeContext: again, she's close to losing it a bit here, "would you" said with max venom

9.speaker: Player
9.text: Can't you kill them yourself? I thought 'gods' were all-powerful.
9.context: NodeContext: again, she's close to losing it a bit here, "would you" said with max venom

95.speaker: Vlaakith
95.text: Perhaps I misheard. You would not speak ill of a god. Would you?
95.context: NodeContext: again, she's close to losing it a bit here, "would you" said with max venom

66.speaker: Lae'zel
66.text: Do not test her. She will be our ruin.
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: The image of Vlaakith flickers away within the planecaster, replaced by an image of the artefact suspended above the device.

77.speaker: Player
77.text: I spoke too hastily - please forgive me.
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: The image of Vlaakith flickers away within the planecaster, replaced by an image of the artefact suspended above the device.

81.speaker: Vlaakith
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: The image of Vlaakith flickers away within the planecaster, replaced by an image of the artefact suspended above the device.

41.text: Use the planecaster's power to enter the artefact.
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: The image of Vlaakith flickers away within the planecaster, replaced by an image of the artefact suspended above the device.

29.text: Use the planecaster's power to enter the artefact.
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith and the hologram disappear after Lae'zel's response.NodeContext: bah na-ZIN - I seek truth

47.speaker: Vlaakith
47.text: Use the planecaster's power to enter the artefact.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith and the hologram disappear after Lae'zel's response.NodeContext: bah na-ZIN - I seek truth

70.speaker: Vlaakith
70.text: Be wary of the creature's lying tongue. Cut it out, if you must.
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith and the hologram disappear after Lae'zel's response.NodeContext: bah na-ZIN - I seek truth

65.speaker: Vlaakith
65.text: W'wargaz. They are not to leave until it is done.
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith and the hologram disappear after Lae'zel's response.NodeContext: bah na-ZIN - I seek truth

121.speaker: Ch'r'ai W'wargaz
121.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith and the hologram disappear after Lae'zel's response.NodeContext: bah na-ZIN - I seek truth

35.speaker: Lae'zel
35.text: Ba na'zin. Our each step, with purpose.
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith and the hologram disappear after Lae'zel's response.NodeContext: bah na-ZIN - I seek truth

71.speaker: Lae'zel
71.text: Vlaakith has spoken. Do not leave this room except to enter the Prism. Turn your back on me, and you will feel my blade against it.

63.speaker: Lae'zel
63.text: Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith. We will not waste a second.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith and the hologram disappear after Lae'zel's response.NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith - Vlaakith's will above all

124.speaker: Vlaakith
124.text: You will not leave this room until it is done.

115.speaker: Player
115.text: I just think a real god could kill whoever she wants.
115.context: CinematicNodeContext: at the word "wish", Vlaakith invokes the most powerful, reality-bending magic of the multiverse. The Wish. her image shakes, as does the room around the players. we cut to gameplay, and they die .

87.speaker: Vlaakith
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: at the word "wish", Vlaakith invokes the most powerful, reality-bending magic of the multiverse. The Wish. her image shakes, as does the room around the players. we cut to gameplay, and they die .

30.speaker: Vlaakith
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: at the word "wish", Vlaakith invokes the most powerful, reality-bending magic of the multiverse. The Wish. her image shakes, as does the room around the players. we cut to gameplay, and they die .

120.speaker: Vlaakith
120.context: CinematicNodeContext: at the word "wish", Vlaakith invokes the most powerful, reality-bending magic of the multiverse. The Wish. her image shakes, as does the room around the players. we cut to gameplay, and they die .

119.speaker: Player
119.text: The god-queen of my people cannot kill someone herself?

42.speaker: Lae'zel
42.text: You must accept. Refuse, and you will know my fury.

108.speaker: Player
108.text: Neither. It is mine by rights.
108.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

109.speaker: Vlaakith
109.text: No. It is not 'yours'. To own something is to know it.
109.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

113.speaker: Player
113.text: I am at your command, my Queen. The artefact is yours.

97.speaker: Vlaakith
97.text: Extend your fealty one step further, and you will be rewarded beyond your mortal reckoning.

46.speaker: Vlaakith
46.text: Inquisitor W'wargaz was potent. We are impressed.
